!38 Handle unique constraint for paper completion marker

* Check if completion marker (topicId=0) exists before inserting
* Add unique constraint SQL file: uk_student_paper_topic
* Prevents duplicate completion marker records

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

!37 Use topicId=0 to determine student paper completion

* Modify is_done query to use paper_course_set_id and topic_id=0
* Modify completion status filter to use paper_course_set_id and topic_id=0
* Now accurately tracks paper completion via the completion marker

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

!36 Add paper completion marker using topicId=0

* Insert a record with topicId=0 when student submits answers
* This marker indicates the student has completed the paper
* Used to track paper completion status for statistics

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

!35 Format NewPaperDTO code

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

!34 Support allowRetake setting when creating paper

* Add allowRetake field to AddPaperDTO
* Add fromAddPaperDTO() static factory method to PaperInCourseDTO
* Modify PaperController to use the new factory method
* Allow setting allowRetake when binding paper to course

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

!33 Add makeup student classification statistics feature

* Add makeUpStudents field to PaperCompletionVO
* Add createTime field to StudentInfoVO
* Modify PaperService.getPaperCompletionStats logic:
  - Classify completed students by submission time
  - Students who submitted after deadline are makeup students
  - Students who submitted before deadline are normal completed students
* Modify selectCompletedStudents SQL to add MIN(scpta.createdTime)

Docs: Update README with pre-push hook information

- Clarify that we use pre-push hook instead of post-push
- Add detailed troubleshooting for push event recording
- Explain hook installation and verification

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

Fix: Use pre-push hook instead of post-push

Git does not support post-push hook natively.
Changed to use pre-push hook which triggers before push operation.

- Add pre-push hook template
- Update hook_installer to install both post-commit and pre-push hooks
- Add generate_pre_push_hook() method

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

Fix: Use pre-push hook instead of post-push

Git does not support post-push hook natively.
Changed to use pre-push hook which triggers before push operation.

- Add pre-push hook template
- Update hook_installer to install both post-commit and pre-push hooks
- Add generate_pre_push_hook() method

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
ä¿®æ”¹BUG

Initial commit: GitSee - Git Activity Monitoring Tool

Features:
- Auto-scan and manage Git repositories
- Monitor commit and push activities via Git hooks
- Web dashboard with statistics and visualization
- Dual storage: SQLite + JSON
- Repository management interface
- Automatic browser opening on startup

Tech Stack:
- Backend: Python 3.7+ + Flask
- Frontend: HTML + CSS + JavaScript + Chart.js
- Database: SQLite

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
